body.raw:
<SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
	<SOAP-ENV:Body>
		<m:GetAiskbReport xmlns:m="urn:CreditBureauIntf-CreditBureau" SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/">
			<userSubdivision xsi:type="xsd:string">String</userSubdivision>
			<userLogin xsi:type="xsd:string">String</userLogin>
			<userName xsi:type="xsd:string">String</userName>
			<birthDate xsi:type="xsd:string">String</birthDate>
			<personalNumber xsi:type="xsd:string">String</personalNumber>
			<docType xsi:type="xsd:int">0</docType>
			<docDate xsi:type="xsd:string">String</docDate>
			<docNumber xsi:type="xsd:string">String</docNumber>
			<assentDate xsi:type="xsd:string">String</assentDate>
			<requestPurpose xsi:type="xsd:int">0</requestPurpose>
			<previousOnly xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</previousOnly>
		</m:GetAiskbReport>
	</SOAP-ENV:Body>
</SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
